name: Kadabra
flavorText:
It emits special
alpha waves from
its body that induce headaches
just by being
close by.

previous.name: Abra
previous.flavorText:
Using its ability
to read minds, it
will identify impending danger
and TELEPORT to
safety.

next.name: Alakazam
next.flavorText:
Its brain can out­
perform a super­
computer. Its intelligence
quotient is said
to be 5,000.
